changelog:
* Add support for signing arbitrary messages in Cardano.
* Add support for displaying the message hash when signing Ethereum EIP-712 typed data.
* Allow using Ethereum mainnet addresses on all non-Ethereum networks.
* Improved Stellar transaction signing interface for a more streamlined user experience.
* Implement multi-item menus for Solana staking.
* Make space between value and unit non-breakable.
* Fixed Solana signature failure.
* Fix crash on first boot.
* Other small improvements and bug fixes.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Make space between value and unit non-breakable.
* Fix crash on first boot.
* Other small improvements and bug fixes.

changelog:
* Human readable Ethereum “approve”/”revoke” flow.
* Changed unknown contract address warning screen.
* Remove BNB Beacon Chain support.
* Remove Turkish language support.
* Fix tutorial-related translations.
* Fix horizontal scroll of the title when setting Wipe code.
* Known Solana tokens' don’t need to be confirmed.
* Fix screen title when confirming installation.
* "Enter passphrase on host" dialog is now not shown immediately after accessing Suite.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Changed unknown contract address warning screen.
* Remove Turkish language support.
* Fix tutorial-related translations.
* Fix horizontal scroll of the title when setting Wipe code.
* Fix screen title when confirming installation.
* "Enter passphrase on host" dialog is now not shown immediately after accessing Suite.

changelog:
* Upgrade bundled bootloader to 2.1.10.
* Add Nostr support (in debug mode only!).
* Solana: rent fee calculation [#4933]
* Solana: loadable token definitions [#3541]
* Replaced "next page" icon with "..." ellipsis when confirming long message.
* Fixed Solana staking dialog title.
* Updated EIP-1559 fee-related labels.
* Allow firmware upgrade even if language change failed.
* Solana: fees calculation is now exact [#4965]
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Upgrade bundled bootloader to 2.1.10.
* Replaced "next page" icon with "..." ellipsis when confirming long message.
* Allow firmware upgrade even if language change failed.

changelog:
* Ability to cancel recovery on word count selection screen.
* New UI for confirming long messages.
* Solana staking confirmation dialogs.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Ability to cancel recovery on word count selection screen.
* New UI for confirming long messages.

changelog:
* Show last typed PIN number for short period of time.
* Multisig-related changes.
* Simplify UI of Cardano transactions initiated by Trezor Suite.
* Included new version of bootloader (2.1.8).
* Fix ETH account number detection.
* New EVM call contract flow UI.
* Fix translation of the 'Enable labeling' screen.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Show last typed PIN number for short period of time.
* Multisig-related changes.
* Included new version of bootloader (2.1.8).
* Fix translation of the 'Enable labeling' screen.

changelog:
* Renamed MATIC to POL, following a network upgrade.
* Fix persistent word when going to previous word during recovery process.
* Fix display orientation south.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Fix persistent word when going to previous word during recovery process.
* Fix display orientation south.
